sentences.english: Older singletons are using the sites as a way to find love.

sentences.english: This old house belonged to an old woman.
sentences.chinese: 這間屋子是一個孤寡老人的。

sentences.english: The local government listed him as an elderly person of no family.
sentences.chinese: 當地政府把他列爲孤寡老人。

sentences.english: The village head led several farmers to plough for the heir less elderly.

sentences.english: For the long-time widow. No one can replace a loved one.
sentences.chinese: 對那些長年孤寡的人來說，沒有人能取代他們的愛人。

sentences.english: But it is undoubtedly a great comfort to many lonely elderly people.
sentences.chinese: 但對許多孤寡老人而言，電視無疑是一種極大的安慰。

sentences.english: She was so kind that she came to administer the medicine to the lonely old sick woman every day.
